title: [Large-Scale] 9th-Grade Science Synthetic Writing Systematic Design-Based Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Scientific Concepts and Paragraph Structuring Ability
context.additional_context: Online collaborative learning environment construction for novice learners in science disciplines

learning_goals: Analyze diverse materials on scientific topics to accurately extract core content with over 80% precision.
Compose a scientifically integrated text with a logical structure that incorporates 3–5 sources.
Apply and adhere to academic writing conventions (references, citations, plagiarism prevention) with over 90% compliance.

Learners revise a research report draft incorporating ≥3 peer feedbacks and submit a final report within six months achieving 'excellent' grades in four out of five instructor-provided evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
